name: PowerCenter:Use Worklets
description:
Folder should have at least a ratio number of worklets/total number of Workflows greater than X%.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will
output:
This report lists all Folders with number of Worklets/total Workflows ratio lower than X %.
It provides the following information
Folder full name, ratio value
rationale: For understandability or speed of development, maintainability and evolutivity management, use worklets for complex scheduling logic packaging or reuse.
remediation: Create worklets to reuse and/or package complex scheduling logic.
